name: Shadowblade
text: You are a shadowblade, an assassin capable of crafting the raw stuff of the night into a deadly weapon. At your command, the shadows twist and sway. With a gesture, you can craft a shadowblade, a weapon of pure darkness that is as sharp as any blade of steel. As long as a shadow is near you, you are never unarmed.

features.masterOfShadows(shadowblade)(11thLevel): When you reduce any enemy to 0 hit points with your shadowblade, you gain a gloom shard
features.shadowbladeAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you gain combat advantage for all your attacks until the end of your turn, and as your last action of the turn, you can teleport 10 squares as a free action
features.weaponOfTheNight(11thLevel): As a minor action, you can create a shadowblade
